text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump If it's to do w/coronavirus SHOULD BE announced + explained by task force + the expert doctors.
HIM is the last person that should be talking about testing, or advising anyone medically. 
HIM is a laughing stock!
Choice of doing what's right or his tv time, he chooses HIM again!
